creator: oliver_lloyd@hotmail.com
text:
Adding URL Patterns to Exclude on the HTTP Proxy Recorder is click intensive, it would be better if it were possible to paste from clipboard. This would be similar functionality to what is included in the User Defined Variables control, 'Paste From Clipboard'.

Relates to Bug 53875.

Date: Sun Sep 16 21:28:23 2012
New Revision: 1385377

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1385377&view=rev
Log:
Bug 53876 - Allow URL Filters (HTTP Proxy) to be pasted from clipboard
Bugzilla Id: 53876

Modified:
    jmeter/trunk/src/protocol/http/org/apache/jmeter/protocol/http/proxy/gui/ProxyControlGui.java

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
